name: Accrete.js
description: Accrete.js is a port of the awesome planetary system simulation algorithm, [Accrete](http://www.rand.org/pubs/papers/P4226.html) to JavaScript. Originally published* and partly programmed (via FORTRAN) by the amazing Stephen H. Dole. Almost a decade later Carl Sagan and Richard Isaacson refined Dole's model -- which shortly thereafter was also implemented in FORTRAN, and again elaborately and academically published by Martin Fogg.
